name: Fantastic Pinball Thrills
description: Are you ready for the ultimate Pinball challenge? The authentically detailed Pinball tables are inviting you to a round of thrilling arcade action. The modern technology ensures a top-notch, state-of-the-art physics simulation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6x, AMD Radeon HD 4x DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: If you're like me and grew up and seen these things all over the place want a fun and silly game, this one is worth $ imho.   I seen a lot a reviews that talk about problem with the ball etc etc... they are still at this time of this review.   But yeah, what'cha see is what ya get. Basic pinball.
Yea this isn't the best Pinball game, but it's far from the worst. If you like Pinball I'd recommend giving it a shot.
